verses.verse: וַיָּ֣חֶל <S%H2490><s%> began שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon לִבְנ֤וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem בְּהַר֙ <S%H2022><s%> in mount הַמּ֣וֹרִיָּ֔ה <S%H4179><s%> Moriah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> where נִרְאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> where [the LORD] appeared לְדָוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִ֑יהוּ <S%H1><s%> his father אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> where הֵכִין֙ <S%H3559><s%> had prepared בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> that David בְּגֹ֖רֶן <S%H1637><s%> in the threshingfloor אָרְנָ֥ן <S%H771><s%> of Ornan הַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusite

וַ֠יָּחֶל <S%H2490><s%> And he began לִבְנ֞וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּחֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> in the second בַּשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> [day] of the second בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> in the fourth לְמַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> of his reign

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these הוּסַ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> was instructed שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Now these [are the things wherein] Solomon לִבְנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> for the building אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God הָאֹ֡רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length אַמּ֞וֹת <S%H520><s%> by cubits בַּמִּדָּ֤ה <S%H4060><s%> measure הָרִֽאשׁוֹנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> after the first אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits שִׁשִּׁ֔ים <S%H8346><s%> [was] threescore וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth אַמּ֥וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> twenty

וְהָאוּלָ֡ם <S%H197><s%> And the porch אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> that [was] in the front הָאֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [of the house] the length עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> accept רֹֽחַב־ <S%H7341><s%> [of it was] according to the breadth הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְהַגֹּ֖בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> and the height מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> [was] an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֑ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וַיְצַפֵּ֥הוּ <S%H6823><s%> and he overlaid מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <S%H6441><s%> it within זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> with pure

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> And the greater חִפָּה֙ <S%H2645><s%> he cieled עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree בְּרוֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H1265><s%> with fir וַיְחַפֵּ֖הוּ <S%H2645><s%> which he overlaid זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> with fine וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> and set עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> with תִּמֹרִ֖ים <S%H8561><s%> thereon palm trees וְשַׁרְשְׁרֽוֹת׃ <S%H8333><s%> and chains

וּמִשְׁקָ֛ל <S%H4948><s%> And the weight לְמִסְמְר֥וֹת <S%H4548><s%> of the nails לִשְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> [was] fifty זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְהָעֲלִיּ֖וֹת <S%H5944><s%> the upper chambers חִפָּ֥ה <S%H2645><s%> And he overlaid זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> with gold
